name: attributeEquals
title: Attribute Equals Selector [name="value"]
desc: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value exactly equal to a certain value.

argument.desc: An attribute value. Can be either an unquoted single word or a quoted string.
argument.name: value

examples.desc: Finds all inputs with a value of "Hot Fuzz" and changes the text of the next sibling span.
